amendment.description: To establish a grant program to provide financial assistance to States and local governments for the costs of providing health care and educational services to noncitizens, and to provide additional funding for the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4072 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 52. Record Vote Number: 133.

action.text: Amendment SA 4072 proposed by Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S4770-4772, S4774-4775; text: CR S4770-4771) To establish a grant program to provide financial assistance to States and local governments for the costs of providing health care and educational services to noncitizens, and to provide additional funding for the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4072 proposed by Senator Clinton.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4072 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 52. Record Vote Number: 133.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4072 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 52. Record Vote Number: 133.
